website_summaries.verdict: If you have your heart set on a Coach bag but don't want to spend a lot of money, this good-looking, reasonably sized crossbody bag is one of the most affordable available.
pros: A must-have for Coach lovers on a budget who want a bag that's easy to carry, has generous pockets, and looks stylish
Sports-coated canvas construction available in numerous Coach signature color combinations
cons: Slightly heavier than some consumers were expecting
A few owners express concerns of authenticity, while others report it has the company's signature serial number

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Travel Size
customer_reviews.text: I carry it everywhere, it is the perfect size for going to Disneyland or something and you dont want to carry your whole life in your purse.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Wall

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, so cute! Exactly like pictured. I had gotten the larger reversible tote a few months back from Coach and absolutely loved it. Recently, I’ve been doing more traveling and wanted something less bulky. I adore the pink and tan and was so excited I found this cross body in the EXACT same trim as my tote. The price isn’t too bad either. It’s about what you’d expect to pay at a discount from the outlet. I am in love with this bag!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE & FAKE
customer_reviews.text: Highly upset with this purchase my bag came damages and this is definently a fake bag beware it's horrible you would think paying 114 would get you edleast a good quality bag even if it wasnt real smh
customer_reviews.author: Kysa

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful authentic Coach crossbody!
customer_reviews.text: This purse is beautiful and exactly what I have been wanting for a loooooong time. It is 100% authentic real Coach. I ordered from the seller Designer_Store and they did not disappoint. Didn’t come in Coach box but was still packaged nicely and no damages to package. Perfect color and perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Malinee

customer_reviews.title: Love this purse!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect!! Love this purse. It is exactly what I was looking for. My wallet fits perfect. Front pocket for my phone. I love the vinyl, easy to clean. Perfect size. Adjustable strap! No inside pockets, which I like, so my hand doesn’t get caught on them reaching in for stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient purse and light weight. It’s my favorite go to mommy bag when I’m on to go, so I’m handsfree dealing with babies and not having to dig through my diaper bag for my phone wallet or keys. It’s also very transformable you can definitely wear it for just about any occasion from on the run with kids, to casually at the movies, a night out for drinks in town, traveling light but large enough to hold your book or tablet or even for a chill dinner with friends.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Looking for a coach bag... stylish, chic... don’t care being a knock off. Here it is!
customer_reviews.text: Bag is smaller than I expected. Little disappointed; but I’m going to keep it.... and still style it off as the designer brand. Do not spend the price listed on this bag the price just went up! Although it is well made and no issue in style and look. I find it’s a bit on the small side. Will carry most items we as ladies put in our handbags. So, the bag I find to adequate. I don’t care about being a knock off.... No one on the street or anywhere you go will tell you this to your face or even care if it is.
customer_reviews.author: Shining Grace

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, beautiful, easy to care for, and goes with everything!
customer_reviews.text: I love the Coach brand, This is 5th bag and I’ve owned the brand purses for the last 20 years. These bags are easy to care for (coach leather cleaner and the ‘Coach Hospital’ for repairs) and are wonderfully made! Stylish and beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: MamaNitaj

customer_reviews.title: First Coach Bag I Bought myself
customer_reviews.text: This was the first Coach bag I bought myself and was anxious because I bought it from here and not the Coach store. I got it faster then Amazon said I would which also made me very happy. It came with official tickets and instructions from Coach on how to care and clean the bag. It was perfect. I am able to fit a lot of stuff inside. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ALMOST Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great looking Coach purse. . .the blue trim is eye-catching. I get tons of compliments on it. But would it have killed Coach to add a pocket to the inside of the bag? I hate fishing around the bottom of my bag for everything. The outside pocket is nice, but it doesn't close and I'm afraid to put anything into it that might stretch it out. This design was not thought through.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine State

customer_reviews.title: Too big for the basics
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this was going to be the solution to my two big and too small coach purse situation. I have a large tote and a double zip clutch but one is too big and one is too small. This ended up being too big also. It doesn’t fit inside of my large tote...it is just too tall. I was hoping to put a small wallet, cell phone, glasses, and just a few make up pencils. I do think it was an authentic coach but didn’t come with the dust cover or box as usual.
customer_reviews.author: RoRo

customer_reviews.title: Authentic Coach! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite purse! It fits more than you need with you! It goes with pretty much every outfit....& oh wait....are you reading bc you're trying to find out if it's authentic??? YES! It IS authentic! I've been using it everyday for almost 2 months & still looking brand new! If this review was helpful please click helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Buss

customer_reviews.title: Plastic !! Smells  like a cheap purse.
customer_reviews.text: This bag is plastic. Such a disappointment for a coach product. But I’m stuck with it. Sad face.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purse
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my wife for her birthday. It came with authenticity tags so as far as we could tell it was authentic. Even if it was a fake, the quality is very nice. She uses it daily and no signs of damage or anything like that.
customer_reviews.author: Feltgull03

customer_reviews.title: It is a great bag!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! Now I was under the impression that it was to have a back zip pocket on the interior and two slip pockets on the interior and it in fact doesn’t have either! So it’s just the large part and then the pocket in the front which I use for my cellphone, face mask, lip gloss(not that you can see if I have any on) and gum!
customer_reviews.author: Janell Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: I am VERY HAPPY with this purchase. Looks exactly like the picture isn’t very small, perfect size for me. I use it for my everyday purse, fit my wallet, small planner and few other things. Love the front pocket for my phone and chapstick. It’s exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: ALR

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but miss the inside pockets
customer_reviews.text: Nice purse, however has no inside pockets, so everything either has to go in the main body of the purse, or outside pocket. I have a very similar coach purse, which has 2 inside pockets, and a larger zippered inside pocket, which I find very useful. I like the color and material. Good bag for an evening out, when you don't need to carry a lot of items.
customer_reviews.author: Dev A

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than similar bags.
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 very similar purses from the Coach store & this one is quite a bit smaller. I miss the little inside zipper pocket the other 2 have. I don’t know if this means this one is a knockoff. I’m keeping it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara J. Christensen

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never purchased a Coach or name brand bag. Doesn’t look like it’s the real deal to me or the the person I bought it for. I guess name brand bags come with a storage cover and is nicely stuffed with tissue and boxed but this just was in a plastic bag. Didn’t feel like I got a good deal so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: C-Shell

customer_reviews.title: This looks better than it really is!
customer_reviews.text: Feels like cheap vinyl, crossbody strap was very cheap, I had to buy another strap for better support of the purse.Does not have any pockets inside, over all I was expecting more from a Coach bag, if it is a coach!
customer_reviews.author: mark sneed

customer_reviews.title: 🤔
customer_reviews.text: The purse looked exactly like picture, perfect size for a crossbody, and quality material. Price was a plus. My dislike with the purse when I decided to rock it, every store I went in the alarms went off. The purse had 0 tags and 0 sensors. I literally dumped everything out my purse and walked through and the alarm still went off. Embarrassing
customer_reviews.author: Prada

customer_reviews.title: LOOKS FAKE NO INSIDE ZIPPER OR PACKETS LIKE ORIGINAL COACH HUGELY DISAPPOITING
customer_reviews.text: WAS SO EXCITED TO FIND THIS CROSS BODY AS IT IS HARD TO FIND NOW. WHEN I OPENED IT I FOUND IT IS NOT THE SIZE OF WHAT U FIND IN THE COACH STORE ABOVE ALL NO INSIDE ZIPPER NO POCKETS NOTHING. WAS VERYDISAPPOINTED NO T SURE IF IT IS ORIGINAL COACH
customer_reviews.author: Experienced Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Coach Crossbody Bag
customer_reviews.text: I love the outside of the bag-color,texture,shine,and pattern. The inside of the bag is disappointing-no pockets for phone,keys, chargers,etc... I'm keeping it because I love the outside so much. Ill make the inside work.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea B

customer_reviews.title: Definitely an Authentic Coach Crossbody! 😊❤️
customer_reviews.text: One of my all time favorite purses! 😊❤️ It was such a great deal for an authentic Coach purse! 😊❤️
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Great crossbody bag!
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for a crossbody bag and I am very pleased with this Coach bag that I purchased. The large pocket on front is perfect for my cell phone and my keys. The bag itself is roomy enough for my large wallet, a small zip wallet, my glasses, lip balm, and gum or mints. The price was right, too! I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: hjkhak

customer_reviews.title: Not disappointed at all.
customer_reviews.text: I can’t wait to use it. I love it. Right size for me. I got my matching wallet from another outlet mall in my area. So I’m thrilled of the condition as it is excellent! It came with a receipt, care instructions and wrapped in plastic. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Evyevey

customer_reviews.title: Is okay.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, there is no inner bag inside the small bag.
customer_reviews.author: SHAW DI

customer_reviews.title: Scratches easily, love my new purse!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new Coach crossbody bag! It goes with everything! Perfect size. Only thing be carful when your shopping with a shopping cart or walking by doorways too close it scratches easily only downfall for me and there is only one outer pocket for cell phones there’s no inside pockets for anything else so I just keep a little coach wallet & small wristlet with me. To put odds n ends in. Very stylish & comfortable light too!
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: The material on this looks beautiful it is so comfortable you could fit a lot of things in there very very happy to have purchased this
customer_reviews.author: miss raquel

customer_reviews.title: It came in a coach box
customer_reviews.text: Thought it would be a bigger purse it is coming to coach box that I question whether........order it and see for yourself
customer_reviews.author: MaDonna

customer_reviews.title: NOT WHAT i EXPECTED!
customer_reviews.text: Like but it's smaller than I expected and it does not have an inner,zipper pocket like the other file bags I have purchased from COACH and AMAZON. I didn't keep it.I gave it to someone as a gift
customer_reviews.author: Kiko

customer_reviews.title: Coach bag that meets vacation needs
customer_reviews.text: No inside pocket and the outer pocket has no clasp otherwise I absolutely love it. Took it on trip to Vegas. Has plenty of room for a wallet, iPhone plus, earbuds, thin eye glass case, inhaler, chapstick and a few wee little items while still being light weight and comfortable to wear for long hours
customer_reviews.author: REBECCA A PATCH

customer_reviews.title: It’s a lovely bag
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. I like the size. Doesn’t have any inside pockets. But, not an issue. Can’t go wrong. Definitely authentic Coach... can tell by the way it was packaged.
customer_reviews.author: sally mccormick

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this crossbody bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this purse. It was just what I was looking for not to small and not too big. The design was really nice and it is an authentic Coach purse, not a knock off.
customer_reviews.author: katrell

customer_reviews.title: Look awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love my coach crossbody...looks very expensive and I have matching wallet. I don't use for work, but when I go to church or out for the evening and nicely dressed, this is what I take it goes with everything and looks awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: No complaints. Perfect gift for girlfriend.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my girlfriend and was skeptical about buying online. Was worried that it would be fake or not look as good as the picture. It’s 100% real and looks even better in person. My girlfriend loves it. It also came with the original tag on it that showed $250 so she thinks I spent more than I did 😂
customer_reviews.author: turntwo463

customer_reviews.title: Very roomy purse!
customer_reviews.text: Great crossbody purse by Coach. Very spacious but has no pouches inside. Saw this bag at the Coach outlet and did not buy it then but found it for the same price on Amazon. I’m a happy shopper!
customer_reviews.author: Rosa M.

customer_reviews.title: Strap and space.
customer_reviews.text: Strap wasnt long enough, and not enough pocketbook for the price. Will use it for shopping. Not everyday wear, needed to be a little bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Mabel Sessoms

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I gave this purse to my daughter for Christmas-she used it for 2 months and one of the handles ripped on the side. Wondering if it was really a Coach purse!! too late to return only had 60 days. Very disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE it!!! Perfect size. Falls perfectly cross shoulder. I would have liked an inside zipper but I’m so happy with the look and size of the bag it’s not a big deal. I like the outside pocket and I have something to hold my lipstick in lieu of the inside zip.
customer_reviews.author: Georgie Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: The coach purse is really nice. Great quality. I wish the strap was stronger it is a little thin; otherwise I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Love this purse!
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love this purse! Perfect size to keep things simple. My only complaint is that I wish it had at least one pocket inside for chapstick, little things, etc. But either way, I'm happy. Great price!
customer_reviews.author: Cali

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: So easy to carry my wallet and love the color and style!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size. Wish it had a zipper pocket in the inside though
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor service-No keeper bag
customer_reviews.text: Completely satisfied with the handbag. Poor satisfaction with vendor. First time EVER I did not receive a Coach satin keeper bag with a Coach handbag. Not up to the Coach standard for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Koivisto

customer_reviews.title: Coach purse
customer_reviews.text: I love the coach purse . It was what I was looking for and won't found one until I looked on Amazon. Thanks so much.
customer_reviews.author: Carol L Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Great looking bag!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter was in awe whe she saw her Coach bag. Perfect size for a 10 years old.
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful, brownie points with the wife! Also holds her .380 Ruger with the wallet nicely with out being noticable.
customer_reviews.author: garrett

customer_reviews.title: The Real Deal
customer_reviews.text: Got this bag for Christmas and couldn’t be happier! Perfect size, perfect color, and perfect transaction! Not the sellers fault, but would love it more if it had zipper area inside . Great gift!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: I ride with Coach
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty bag and the purple strap is even better I love coach bags and I have a few and some I gave away Coach is the way to go
customer_reviews.author: Monique216

customer_reviews.title: Love!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this purse!!! Have a thicker wallet I use and it still fits with other things. Leather is good quality too.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Very Handy
customer_reviews.text: Love my Coach bag and bought also the matching wallet. Enough room in bag for all my stuff.
customer_reviews.author: tiffany chao

customer_reviews.title: Nice crossbody bag
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bag. The only drawback there are no pockets on the inside as shown in the picture. It would be nice to have at least a zippered compartment to be able to put lipstick and a mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: She loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Pictures speak for themselves, but the smile on her face was even better. Great product, Great packaging & priced Right!! Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: LOR8GUY

customer_reviews.title: Birthday Gift
customer_reviews.text: The recipient of this Coach crossbody bag really enjoys it. The quality of the bag is superb.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Rice

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: I love it,, love the size it is bigger than what I imagined,, I ordered the white signature one and love it,, it came with the coach price tag on it and wrapped in a clear coach plastic cover but no dust bag or box came along,,
customer_reviews.author: samar bassam

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this purse! great quality and plenty of space!
customer_reviews.author: drew klinko

customer_reviews.title: Super authentic Purse
customer_reviews.text: Super authentic and it’s beautiful! Real leather and real label came with card and everything! Beautiful colors
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly as I expected and I bought the purse because I’m taking a trip to Florida in the cross body purse is a little more convenient freeze up both my hands
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Rae Sonsteng

customer_reviews.title: Nice size but surely a fake.
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and color, but it has no pockets inside as the photo clearly shows. I may keep it, but warning to anyone ordering that the inside pockets are nonexistent and if authenticity matters to you, do not order.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Stirek

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite bag!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. Not too big. Not too small.
customer_reviews.author: Claudine Earle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my Mom for Christmas and she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fab Coach Crossbody
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for holidays - and it was absolutely perfect. Plenty of room and the material is wipe clean. Strap is adjustable. Color neutral so went with everything- very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cloud

customer_reviews.title: Not sold as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: No inside pockets like picture shows... want a bag with inside pockets!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Eggers

customer_reviews.title: It’s perfect 👌🏾
customer_reviews.text: I love the look, the quality and the color it’s just what I wanted
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Kimbrough

customer_reviews.title: It was what I expected
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift for my daughter in-law who find cross body bags very comfortable for work.
customer_reviews.author: jackie mcbride

customer_reviews.title: I love Coach bags!!
customer_reviews.text: And I bought this bag in several colors!! Very attractive and useful!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Verified authentic coach bag. Came with authentic packaging and Coach store gift receipt! Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my sister in law and she absolutely loved the purse.
customer_reviews.author: millie a fairbanks

customer_reviews.title: Can’t say enough about this classy crossbody bag
customer_reviews.text: LOVE MY BAG! It is gorgeous. It’s not too little nor is it too big. It’s just right.
customer_reviews.author: 1956netta

customer_reviews.title: Well made and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Well made and stylish. One thing I would have liked would be some internal pockets.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Very spacious
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and simple. Fits a lot of stuff yet looks very classy.
customer_reviews.author: L. Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great and sturdy I use it every day, it’s the right size & fit

customer_reviews.title: Its casual but classy
customer_reviews.text: It works perfectly and I can carry everything I need. It's the perfect size!
customer_reviews.author: cm

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I just wish it had one pocket on the inside.
customer_reviews.author: MomoLove

customer_reviews.title: Not quite what I want
customer_reviews.text: Vinyl finish not cloth and bigger than I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: peg

customer_reviews.title: Pretty bag for a pretty woman
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife since she loves Coach She loves it
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Coach crossbody
customer_reviews.text: I love my coach crossbody. It has a long & sturdy strap.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend if u don't carry much
customer_reviews.text: Very nice but it was a little small for my purposes
customer_reviews.author: dee bradley

customer_reviews.title: Probably fake
customer_reviews.text: Love it great bag can’t tell if it’s real or not thou didn’t come with usual coach packaging or storage bag probably fake but still nice
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag get a lot of compliments holds a lot and very stylish
customer_reviews.author: Dawnt14

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, item description exactly correct...will purchase from this seller again...5 stars
customer_reviews.author: BHenrikson

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Definitely authentic! My mom hijacked my other crossbody, that I had bought from the Coach store and I really missed it. So when I saw this one I didnt even hesitate. So glad I have it back now.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie420

customer_reviews.title: Coach Crossbody
customer_reviews.text: I love my newest Coach Crossbody Bag. It is beautiful and stylish. Love the brown/black design. Would recommend this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Dea M. Pittman

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag is so easy to carry and holds my phone and Kindle with no slippagr

customer_reviews.title: Love Coach
customer_reviews.text: This bag perfect for those occasions when a larger bag won't do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Authentic coach brand
customer_reviews.text: Love it...it did not come in a coach package but the item is brand new and good condition. It is what expected as shown in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Like it. It's good and perfect size as I bought for a gift
customer_reviews.author: Nahid Mayeli

customer_reviews.title: Don't know what you want here
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift. Looked good on computer but we did not like the finish instead of original coach are material that we have. This had like a plastic finish on it which cheapened it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute purse
customer_reviews.text: Good size , color, easy to wear as cross body

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely in love with this purse. A must buy. Perfect size.

customer_reviews.text: It was perfect for vacation. More room inside than I expected..

customer_reviews.text: Great size purse for me as I don’t like to carry a large purse. Color is perfect since it is neutral tone to match my outfits,

customer_reviews.title: Good transaction and product.
customer_reviews.text: Good transaction. Purchase arrived early and is exactly what we expected. My wife loves it.

customer_reviews.title: Great purse
customer_reviews.text: I love it, it’s a little smaller than I had in mind but works great when I am out with the kids.

customer_reviews.title: Nice purse
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty and useable purse. It’s not flimsy and has a large pocket. Love it.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag, it’s cute and has enough room for a good amount of things.

customer_reviews.title: Great price. Its beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Oh yes!!! Got it for my daughter and it fits her style to a T. Great price. Its beautiful

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, cute and a good price. The quality is exactly what should be expected.

customer_reviews.title: Super happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived earlier than expected, with a thank you note which was very nice to see. I’ll buy another one as soon as I can.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

product_meta.description:
Coach Signature Zip File Crossbody Bag

    *  #16871 inWomen's Shops

feature_bullets: Signature coated canvas with smooth leather details
Adjustable strap with 21 3/4" drop for shoulder or crossbody wear
